select * from trip
where title like concat ('%', #{searchName}, '%') where content like concat ('%', #{searchName}, '%') where writer like concat ('%', #{searchName}, '%') where title like concat ('%', #{searchName}, '%') or content like concat ('%', #{searchName}, '%')
where 1 = 1
order by tno desc limit #{pageStart}, #{amount}

select count(*) as total from trip
where title like concat ('%', #{searchName}, '%') where content like concat ('%', #{searchName}, '%') where writer like concat ('%', #{searchName}, '%') where title like concat ('%', #{searchName}, '%') or content like concat ('%', #{searchName}, '%')
mapper.update: update trip set hit = hit + 1 where tno = #{tno}
mapper.select: select * from trip where tno in ( (select tno from trip where tno < #{tno} order by tno desc limit 1), (select tno from trip where tno > #{tno} limit 1) ) order by tno desc
